sources.title: Street Of Fury
sources.description: 龍虎砵蘭街 (1996) Street of Fury Alias: Streets of Fury Alias: 光頭艷姬VS少年大兄 Origin: Hong Kong Languages: Cantonese  Mandarin  Brothers Lung and Fu were raised in Nam Tin housing project. Fu always thought only joining the underworld is his only way out. Fu's girlfriend Yi is raped by local bully "Four Eyes" Keung. In a rage Lung and Fu attacked Four Eyes and injured him. They know they can't stay in Nam Tin and decided to move to Portland Street for a new life. Later in a gang fight, Fu insults Keung's boss, Crazy Fai and is chased by him and his gang. [from Next Magazine]

metadata.Plot: A decent movie, with a moderately interesting story.  Certain parts feature some really good humour, others some cool gang fighting, but all in all, it just fell short due to the fact that you just don't care enough about the characters.  Not bad, good if you can pick it up for cheap, but don't pay import prices for it.
metadata.Actors: Louis Koo, Michael Tse, Gigi Lai
